title: One more Influencer exposed
selftext:
Thread: https://twitter.com/SatarkAadmi/status/1701565930650706306?t=0sbDKt07UKDd_iONYiaYqQ&s=19

This is a thread which got around 17 million impressions. What do you think about this guy?
comments: Twitter only allow to see the post that's shared, not the whole thread, without account. Can you share screen shot?
